entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is introducing a new Divination teacher.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A Ministry official who is questioning Dumbledore's decision to appoint a new Divination teacher.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The governing body of magic in the wizarding world. They have issued Educational Decree Twenty-two.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Umbridge are disagreeing about the appointment of a new Divination teacher.
Dumbledore is complying with Educational Decree Twenty-two by appointing a suitable candidate.
